title: Fix m a t c h m a k i n g @AnyRioter
body: Why am I getting diamond and plat players in my game? Their mmr is far higher than mine but i still get queued with them, granted their better teammates and enemies but I don't  care I want to play in the ELO i was placed in which is Silver, so PAIR me up with silver or gold players no 3 or 2 elos above me. Maybe if i was paired with players in the proper elos i could climb more steadily instead of playing plat games in silver.

replies.body: Because normal and ranked have two different MMRs.
In ranked I still get plat and diamond  players  like 1/3 of the few games i do have

> [{quoted}](name=Youfus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fV8Lqgvp,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-06-17T05:12:32.733+0000)
>
> In ranked I still get play and diamond  players  like half of the few games i do have

That is because the plats players have really REALLY shit MMR and w/l rates.

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=chessmage

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=justjoking

Theres also the possibility that you may have abnormally high mmr as well (that doesn't match your ranking). How much lp are you gaining each win? 20+? From youtube knowledge that tends to indicate you have higher mmr than your actual rank which could explain why you're getting matched up against higher tiers?
I can't remember how much exactly but i had like 19 lp and won 2 matches and now have 68 lp
